name: Darakhul Shadowmancer
description: The Darakhul Shadowmancer is a Medium undead creature embodying dark magic and cunning. It wears a prepared disguise and utilizes shadowy evasion to remain hidden, enhancing its ambush capabilities.
memorable: It blends stealth and high-level spellcasting, using shadows and deception effectively in combat.
goals: To manipulate shadows and ambush foes while employing its dark spells.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead, particularly ghouls.
environment: Typically found in dark, shadowy places, avoiding bright sunlight.
strengths: Resilient to poison and necrotic damage; adept in Arcana and Stealth skills.
weaknesses: Aversion to sunlight and reliance on darkness for abilities.
attacks: Utilizes a melee bite attack that can inflict darakhul fever and a dagger for piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Has powerful spellcasting abilities as a 9th-level wizard, capable of manipulating shadows and creating illusions.
senses: It possesses darkvision up to 60 feet.
skills: Skilled in Arcana and Investigation, making it adept at deciphering magical phenomena.
additional_information: Master of Disguise allows it to appear as a living creature.
Shadow Stealth enables hiding in dim light or darkness as a bonus action.
Sunlight Sensitivity imposes disadvantages in bright light.
Turning Defiance grants it advantages against effects that turn undead.
spellcasting: Functions as a 9th-level wizard with a diverse spell list including powerful offensive and utility spells.
